TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Title extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class Title Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea, IDisposable

summary.span: 表示整个图表图像的标题。

span.span: Represents a title for the entire chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装的标题的所有功能控件。The class encapsulates all the functionality of a title for the control. 使用公开此类集合的根属性对象。This class is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意数目的整个图表图像的标题。There can be any number of titles for an entire chart image. 标题是可以：Titles are able to: - 是停靠和对齐或自定义定位。Be docked and aligned or custom-positioned. - 显示内部或外部绘制的图表区。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 使用一个预定义如或。Use a predefined such as or . - 使用阴影、 渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 可调整大小和在图表图像中任意位置放置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不起对齐如果属性未设置为。The property has no effect on alignment if the property is not set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，用于显示标题的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值将为第一种颜色使用如果已指定背景的渐变颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色的不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 也就是说，如果你使用的 alpha 值为 0-无颜色将分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，背景将呈透明。As a result, the background will be transparent.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示标题的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否标题将显示渐变，并以确定渐变的方向，如果一个使用。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 设置标题背景的主色属性。Set the primary color of the title background with the property. 设置标题背景辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color of the title background with the property. 将此项设置为所需的渐变样式的属性。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示标题的阴影样式。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的直线组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **请注意**阴影行的颜色由属性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BackImage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径标题，并可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a title, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 你还可以指定通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色之一属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 映像是支持.NET Framework，包括图标的任何有效图形文件。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他后台属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时属性设置为。This property is used when the property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置在绘制背景图像时，将绘制为透明色的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 一个 值，表示绘制背景图像时，它将绘制为透明色。

span.span: A value that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现图表时，此颜色将显示为透明。This color will be displayed as transparent when the chart is rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示该标题的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图像的显示方式; 映像可以平铺、 缩放后，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合标题的边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the title. 如果平铺图像，则从标题的左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the title. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the title background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性是确定的辅助背景色的多个相关属性之一对象，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 你可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定标题阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the title. 若要使用的标题背景渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a title: - 设置与主要颜色属性。Set the primary color with the property. - 设置使用的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 设置为所需的渐变样式的属性。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking Docking { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Docking value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个决定标题停靠位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines where the title is docked.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，它指定标题的的停靠位置。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the docking location of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以停靠到顶部、 左侧、 底部或右侧的整个图表图像或内部或外部的图表区。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果属性设置为`false`，停靠适用于整个图表图像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果属性设置为`true`，停靠适用于指定对象属性If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 此属性如果不起作用属性未设置为。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用新对象设置此属性时。Use a new object when setting this property. 将整个对象分配给属性。Assign the entire object to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDockedInsideChartArea { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定标题是否应停靠于 对象之内的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the title should be docked within a object.

value.span: 如果标题将在图表区域内停靠，则为 ；如果标题将在图表区域外停靠，则为 。

span.span: if the title will be docked within a chart area; if the title will be docked outside the chart area.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`false`，在标题停靠到外缘绘制的图表区中; 如果此属性设置为`true`，标题将停靠到内部的图表区的边缘。If the property is set to `false`, the title is docked to the outside edge of the plotted chart areas; if this property is set to `true`, the title will be docked to the inside edge of the chart area. 此属性将产生任何影响，如果名称对象未分配给属性。This property will have no effect if the name of a object is not assigned to the property. **请注意**此行为仅适用于时属性设置为。**Note** This behavior only applies if the property is set to . 如果这不是这种情况，则将设置属性不起作用，因为标题的位置然后由属性值。If this is not the case, setting the property has no effect, because the position of the title is then determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的映射区特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，表示标题的映射区域特性。

span.span: A value that represents the map area attributes of the title.

value.span: 默认值为零长度字符串。

span.span: The default is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 映射区还将创建，其特性字符串追加到与\<映射 > 对应于为其设置此属性的图表对象的标记。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the chart object for which this property is being set. 因为整个属性字符串追加到\<映射 > 标记中，应该用空格分隔多个属性。Because the entire attribute string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 属性可以与结合使用属性来指定映射区特性，例如，目标 = _Blank，以及客户端事件处理程序，例如，OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, Target= _Blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 设置此属性将产生任何影响，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 其默认值是`true`。Its default value is `true`. **重要**以这种方式，来创建图像映射属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 当设置此属性; 时，可以使用特殊关键字每个关键字将替换为某种类型的数据从适用的图表元素。Special keywords may be used when setting this property; each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 请参阅下表中的所有可用的关键字的列表：Refer to the following table for a listing of all available keywords: |关键字Keyword|替换为Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|数据点的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL，#VALY，#VALY2，#VALY3...#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|数据点的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|序列名称。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|数据点标签。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|数据点索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|百分比的数据点 Y 值。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|序列中的所有 Y 值的总计。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|图例文本。Legend text.| 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Name { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，表示标题对象的唯一名称。

span.span: A value that represents the unique name of the title object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题对象的名称必须是唯一的;否则将引发异常。The name of a title object must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此属性可以用作索引器，当你检索时对象对象。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果此属性设置为零长度字符串，则将引发异常。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ Position { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于获取或设置标题位置的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which can be used to get or set the position of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标题的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the position of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是自动 (即，Title.Position.Auto = `true`) 自动计算标题位置控件，并考虑，和属性设置。If the property is automatic (that is, Title.Position.Auto = `true`) the title position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不是自动进行的，和属性将被忽略，和标题位置由所返回的值单独确定对象。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the title position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PostBackValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在发生 事件时，可以处理的回发值。

span.span: Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a event.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示传递给 事件的值。

span.span: A value that represents the value that is passed to a event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color for the title.

value.span: 标题的 值。

span.span: A value for the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可以用于实现"真实"隐藏作用;请尝试"128,0,0,0"阴影的颜色值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置为零 (0) 以外的值的属性。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标题的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请将此属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致向下和向右; 移动阴影负值将导致阴影向上和向左移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标题的文本。

span.span: A value that represents the text for the title.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation TextOrientation { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题中文本的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the text in the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定标题的方向。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the orientation of the text in the title.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextStyle TextStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的文本样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定标题的文本样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有五个可能的标题文本的样式： ， ， ， ，和。There are five possible styles for title text: , , , , and . 请参阅下表中的这些样式的摘要：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |样式Style|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |默认Default|使用所需的字体和颜色，没有其他效果显示文本。Text is displayed using the desired font and color, with no additional effects.| |阴影Shadow|添加的阴影效果的文本中使用的所需的字体和颜色显示文本。Text is displayed using the desired font and color with an added shadow effect on the text.| |阳文Emboss|文本将显示使用所需的字体和颜色但绘制带有浮雕效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embossing effect.| |嵌入Embed|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示但绘制为带有嵌入的效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embedding effect.| |FrameFrame|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示但没有填充为文本，即一个轮廓绘制。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn as an outline of the text, that is, with no fill.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip for the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标题的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 此外将其标题特性设置为指定的工具提示字符串创建的地图区域。A map area will also be created with its Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 映射区将使用对应于标题的尺寸。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the title. 设置此属性将产生任何影响，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**以这种方式，来创建图像映射属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置标题超链接的目标 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the target URL of the hyperlink for the title.

value.span: 表示该标题超链接的目标 URL 值。

span.span: A value that represents the target URL of the hyperlink for the title.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性时，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 映射区还将创建其 HREF 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL。A map area will also be created with its HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 设置此属性将产生任何影响，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**以这种方式，来创建图像映射属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 属性的映射区域中，例如，面向 = _Blank，可以通过使用指定属性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, TARGET=_Blank, can be specified by using the property. 属性可以设置要显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据的特殊关键字。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the title is visible.
